jparsec.vo

Class CDSQuery

  • java.lang.Object
    • jparsec.vo.CDSQuery
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class CDSQuery
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    A class to transform coordinates using CDS web service.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    T. Alonso Albi - OAN (Spain)
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

        frame1 - Input frame.
        frame2 - Output frame.
        loc - Input coordinates.
        precision - Precision id constant.

        equinox2 - Output equinox.

        public LocationElement query()
                      throws JPARSECException
        Perform the query.
        Returns:
        Response from server.
        Throws:
        JPARSECException - If an error occurs.

      • query

        public static LocationElement query(CDSQuery.FRAME frame1,
                    CDSQuery.FRAME frame2,
                    LocationElement loc,
                    CDSQuery.PRECISION precision,
                    double equinox1,
                    double equinox2)
                             throws JPARSECException
        Converts coordinates.
        Parameters:
        frame1 - Frame for input coordinates.
        frame2 - Frame for output coordinates.
        loc - Input coordinates in radians.
        precision - Precision.
        equinox1 - Input equinox in Julian or Besselian years.
        equinox2 - Output equinox.
        Returns:
        Conversion.
        Throws:
        JPARSECException - If an error occurs.

        Returns:

        Returns:
        Declination in radians.

      • transformVizierCoordinatesToJ2000

        public static LocationElement transformVizierCoordinatesToJ2000(VizierElement viz,
                                                cds.savot.model.TDSet td)
                                                         throws JPARSECException
        Transform Vizier coordinates into J2000.
        Parameters:
        viz - Vizier object.
        td - TDSet object with a record in the catalog.
        Returns:
        J2000 coordinates.
        Throws:
        JPARSECException - If an error occurs.

      • transformVizierCoordinatesToJ2000

        public static LocationElement transformVizierCoordinatesToJ2000(VizierElement viz,
                                                java.lang.String ra,
                                                java.lang.String dec)
                                                         throws JPARSECException
        Transform Vizier coordinates into J2000 using CDS. In case of error, transformation will be performed using JPARSEC.
        Parameters:
        viz - Vizier object.
        ra - Right ascension as given by Vizier (## ## ##.### or ###.######).
        dec - Declination as given by Vizier (+## ## ##.### or ###.####).
        Returns:
        J2000 coordinates.
        Throws:
        JPARSECException - If an error occurs.

        For unit testing only.
        Parameters:
        args - Not used.
